p: Yield 64%, m.p. 165 °C. Analysis calculated C 20H 21N 5; calcd.: % C 72.48; H, 6.39; N, 21.13; found: % C 72.54; H, 6.42; N, 21.10. IR: υ max./cm −1 3320 (NH), 3030 (C–H aromatic), 2220 (CN), 1600 (C═C). 13C NMR (DMSO-d 6): 151, 146, 134, 133, 131, 129, 128, 127, 125, 115, 112, 111, 54, 47, 45, 42. 1H NMR: δ 2.1 (s, 1H, NH, D 2O exchangeable), 2.4–2.9 (m, 8H, piperazinyl protons), 3.3 (dd, 1H, J= 11.4, 5.1 Hz, pyrazoline), 3.4 (dd, 1H, J= 11.3, 6.1 Hz, pyrazoline), 5.0 (dd, 1H, J = 11.0, 5.5 Hz, pyrazoline), 7.0–7.7 (m, 8H, Ar-H), and 9.0 (s, NH, D 2O exchangeable). MS: m/z (% relative intensity)=331 (M +, 14%), 77 (100%).
